text.p: These are the leading stories in the Moroccan press on Saturday. Reuters has not verified these stories and does not vouch for their accuracy.
- Morocco celebrates 53rd anniversary of independance manifesto.
- Opposition democratic group La Koutla holds meeting in Casablanca to celebrate independance manifesto.
- Taxi driver Hamid Bouzguia murdered by unknown men in a remote area near Casablanca.
- Morocco will build a nuclear centre following the signing of loan accord with France.
- Morocco and Mali pledge to boost cooperation.
- Morocco to set up a National Observatory for Childhood.
